Even Ellen shuts up about needing to call her dealer.
"If you guys understand, go and pack. We leave in two hours."

Once you're packed and ready, Megan carries you on her shoulder out to the car. She's wearing a baggy sweats and a tank top cut short, revealing an impressive view of her abs. Aunt Brenda's SUV has enough room for everyone. Your aunt drives, mom is in passenger and you kids are in the back. You're too small for a seat, so Megan holds you against her warm stomach within her open palm. The adults keep trying to make conversation, but none of you are in the mood. You and Megan actually like going to school. After only half an hour of packing, you two spent the rest of time on the phone telling your friends about your absence. Ellen is down too, but that's because she's still sober. When you walked by her room she was packing a bag that had at least half a pound of weed in it, but you know that won't last longer than two weeks. None of you say anything for a long time, simply listening to the radio for an hour. But then your favorite song comes on.

You start singing along happily while jamming out. You get up and start dancing around along the surface of Megan's palm. But when a bump hits the car, you bounce off the surface of her palm. You fall towards the floor for less than a second before your sister grabs you out of the air. She opens her hand again and holds you near her stomach again. Her finger gently rubs your head, ruffling your hair. It's nice having a sister that cares about you so much. Another half hour goes by before you think of something.
"Come to think of it...where are we going?" you ask.
"Good question"
"What is, Megan?"
"Tina asked where we're going"
"Oh that's right! I haven't told you yet, have I? Well, we're on our way to...
1153.title: take a family vacation!"

11531.content:
"A ranch? You're joking right?" Megan asks.
"What? It'll be fun!"
"Better be a pot farm..." Ellen mumbles.
"Who even takes a vacation at a ranch?!"
"Lots of people! I read in the brochure that it's a great way for families to bond. Here, look" she says while handing back the brochure. Megan opens it so you and Ellen can read as well.

Jaxson Farms Family Ranch!
Tired of city life? Want to get away while learning how to live off the land?
We offer a wide variety of activities for the whole family to enjoy!
Enjoy genuine ranch life!

The pamphlet continued like that throughout the entire thing. You can already see what it's about. You pay hundreds of dollars to stay in a guest house while doing their chores under the pretense of teaching kids responsibility. Besides families, it's a women only facility to teach women strength and independence.
"This is going to suck" you blurt.
"Agreed" Megan chimes.
"For sure" Ellen agrees.
"Tina, did you make a comment you want to share with me?"
"No she didn't mom!" Megan says, covering for you.
"Good. We're going to have fun out there, so just give it a chance." Everyone groans while your mom and aunt chuckle.

The next five hours go by in a flash to you, mainly because you fall asleep in Megan's lap. Soft thighs really do make for a great pillow. Once you wake up, there's nothing but corn stalks surrounding the road. For miles around there's nothing but farmland. Megan and Ellen had given up on their cell phones long ago.

Driving up to the house fills everyone with dread. There are two houses in a clearing between corn fields with a big sign saying "Jason Farms!" in faded letters. Both houses are two story farm houses. One is painted white and has a welcoming feel to it. The other is a crumbling apart, piece of crap. The unpainted wood is covered in splinters with obviously broken pieces all over. You can practically hear the weak foundation groaning.

Everyone piles out after parking the car in front of the nice house. There's a swinging bench on one side of the porch and a rocking chair on the other. A dirty barn is a good distance away from the houses. It feels like a stereotypical ranch.
"Hello? Is anyone here?" your mom calls out. She knocks on the door a few times, but no one answers.
"Hey! Over here!" a young voice calls out. Everyone looked back, and you realized this trip would be better than you thought.

Three blonde haired women were making their way over to you. The one calling out was a waving girl around eleven or twelve years old wearing overalls, a dirty shirt and barefoot. Her hair was tied back in cute pigtails. Following behind her was a tall, muscular girl around your age dressed like her sister but with boots. She was about the same height as Megan, but her arms were more hard and toned with muscle. Her long hair was tied back in a single ponytail, keeping her smiling, freckled face clear. Lastly was a short haired woman in her forties. She was the only one not wearing overalls, instead walking with dirty jeans and a flannel. A large scar ran up from her neck to her cheek, her fierce eyes piercing through you and your family. Looking her over, her arms were muscular and covered in small scars. She tipped her cowboy hat at you. They all had the same color light blonde hair and blue eyes, so they're definitely a family.

Once they were close enough the mother stepped forward with an indifferent face.
"So, you folks the Sansons and Gages?"
"Y-yes, that would be us" your mother sputters out. The woman snorted before spitting a loogie at the ground.
"We're the Carters. I'm Anne, these are my two daughters. The older one is Marie, young one is Carla." Both daughters waved after being mentioned. "Let's be clear here, this ain't gonna be a vacation. Everyone will get their own chores. Everyone is responsible for maintaining a clean living space. If the chores do not get done, feel free to pack up and leave. Y'all are responsible for your day meals, but Marie'll cook you up a nice dinner if you finish your work. The pantry and fridge is full, let me know if you need anything. We go to town once a week for groceries and things. Feel free to come along. Last thing, no refunds. Questions?"
"Why do we need to work if we're paying you?" Ellen moans.
"You paid me for a genuine farm experience, not for me to wipe your ass. Hard work builds character, and from the look of ya you need to do some work." Ellen gasps in shock while you hold back a laugh.
"Are there any sexy farm hands around?" Brenda asks.
"Only me and my daughters are here."
"Where are we sleeping?" Megan asks.
"Y'all take the white house while we stay in the wood house. We normally live in the white one, but the guest house is in no condition for guests right now."
"Why only women?" she asks again.
"We don't need men 'round here. Women can handle country life just as fine as men did. I built this farm with my own two hands after my ex-husband raped me, beat me, and tol' me I ain't shit. So the reason it's only women is a big middle finger to that fucker to show him that farming isn't a man's world. To answer the unanswered question, he's the one that gave me the shiner." She stuck her thumb to her cheek scar.
"Um...my daughter has a bit of a...physical handicap, and can't do chores. What should she do?" your mother asked. Anne walked up towards you and Megan, standing inches away from her. She only came up to her shoulders, but stared at her hard. Megan met her eyes and didn't back down.
"Looks fine to me. Probably almost as strong as Marie with those arms."
"Um, I think she meant me" you speak up. She glanced down at the sound of your voice, spotting you in your sister's palm. Then let out a girly yelp.
"What the hell is that?!"
"Do NOT speak about my daughter like that!" you mother yelled.
"What, have a problem with my sister?" Megan added, murder in her eyes. But she wasn't paying attention to them, her terrified eyes locked onto you.

"Nice to meet you, I'm Tina!" you call out. You give her a small wave, and she takes a step back.
"Is...is she...human?"
"Yes, I am and I'm perfectly capable of speaking for myself!" you correct. Anne places a hand on her chest and takes a few deep breathes before returning to her cold exterior.
"Right...my apologies, little missy. I've never seen someone so...short before."
"It's alright. I'm used to it" you beam. Normally you're offended when people treat you like that. But pretty girls get a free pass. Even tough, older cowgirls.
"Well...thanks. I don't mean to discriminate. But as for your chores...I guess you can just help out one of us."
"Will that be fine?" your mom asks.
"I don't mind, and neither will the girls. She won't be much help on her own, so she might as well learn first hand what we do."
"So, who will I be working with?" you ask.
"I'll leave that up to you. You can decide once y'all get settled. Work for you folk don't start till tomorrow anyway." Your family asks a few more questions before finally unpacking the car.

You and Megan share Carla's room, Ellen gets Marie's, and Catherine and Brenda take Anne's. Carla's room is exactly what you'd expect it to be for a girl her age. Lots of pink with dolls all around the room. Thankfully the doll beds are actually pretty soft, but they're made for dolls much larger than yourself so it feels beyond king sized. Your home for the next month is actually pretty cozy, the furniture is all well worn and looks old. Family pictures fill the walls next to the knick knacks.

After a few hours night rolls in. Marie came in without a word and started cooking dinner. You watched her from the doorway for awhile. She seems to be an experienced cook. After an hour she rings a bell and calls everyone to the dinner table. Anne and Carla help set the table as Marie places bowls of food around the long table. You sit next to Megan at the table. Everyone in your family sits at one end while the Carters sit on the other, with Anne at the head.

Dinner tastes delicious, but the atmosphere is awkward. Your mom tries to make conversation, but Anne only gives short answers. She's starting to realize that this might have been a mistake.
"So, Tina was it?" Anne asks.
"Y-yeah?"
"Tomorrow your family starts work. You can choose one of us to work with so you don't get in the way."
"Um...okay."
"Let me break it down for you. I'm in charge of managing this place. I also work the heavy machinery and do repairs. Marie is in charge of housework, chopping wood, cleaning the stables, and grooming the animals. Carla feeds the animals and helps Marie. But since she's young, we give her more free time to play. So, who do you want to go with?"

To be honest, you haven't been paying attention to what she said. The chores they do don't mean much since you'll only be watching them work. You just want to hang out with a pretty blonde. But there is one person you really want to get to know...
"Well, I guess I'll pick..."
11531.title: Country Style Vacation

12.content:
"School, obviously. Oh, and we're going to be late if you don't hurry." You snap your head back to see your sister leaning against the wall behind you. How long was she there for? She was wearing sneakers, long athletic shorts, and a plain black t-shirt. Her toned arms are crossed under her generous chest, pushing them out more. You always tell her she should show a little more skin. The sight of her muscular, tan thighs enters your mind. If it came between the two of you, everyone would likely agree she's the pretty sister.
"Don't worry, I'm almost done. I just need a little breakfast and I'll grab my backpack."
"We leave in five minutes. Go grab your bag, I'll get a protein bar and we can split it."
"Deal." Her giant steps take her away in an instant while you run back inside. Your backpack was already waiting for you on a plastic chair, where you always keep it. Honestly, you hardly need it. All your exams have to be done by a teacher writing down your answers. Apparently the school board doesn't care enough to make tests small enough for you. But you do keep some micro pencils and scraps of paper to take notes with. You sling the bag over your shoulders and head out.

You don't even get the chance to close the door to your room before two giant fingers pinch your backpack and pull you miles into the sky. As a kid, the force would make you sick to your stomach. Nowadays you could get kicked into space without batting an eyelash. Megan is already on her way to the car, a chocolate flavored energy bar in hand. Once outside you see your mom already waiting for you, singing along to some song on the radio while sipping coffee. She's wearing a tight sitting v neck that shows a good bit of cleavage, but you can't see the rest of her outfit from Magan's hand. Usually Megan is the one who drives you around, but her truck is in the shop. Megan gets in and slams her door.
"Ok, let's step on it" she says.
"Honey, I know you're in a rush but don't slam my door. And while we're at it, you could at least be polite."
"Ugh, sorry mom. Can we PLEASE step on it?"
"That's better." You chuckle at your mother's scolding, resulting in a weak flick to the back of your head. Once the car starts moving Megan opens the bar and takes a huge bite out of it.
"Hey, you said we were sharing!" you jokingly complain. She rolls her eyes and takes another bite. The bar is already half gone. This calls for drastic measures. You leap out of the hand carrying you and latch onto the fingers holding the bar. You swiftly reach your head down and take a bite. You take a few more and feel yourself quickly becoming full. Your sister uses these things to get lots of protein in the mornings for her workouts. It's astounding she can finish it all.

She sees you slowing down and decides to finish it. Her grip shifts as she pushes one end into her mouth and uses a single finger to push the whole bar passed her full lips.
"Hey!" you yell up at her. She lets out a small giggle. Carefully climbing her finger, you take one last bite just before the last of the bar disappears behind the tan wall of skin. You swallow quickly then reach forward and give Megan a kiss on the lips. Her huge, warm, plush lips...
"Thanks for sharing with me" you say sweetly. She pulls her hand away from her mouth and pats you on the head.
"Love you too, sis." You sit back and let your sister gently pet your back for the rest of the car ride. People are usually amazed at how gentle your sister is to you, considering she's a beast while playing sports. Others call you inbreds because of how you like to kiss on the lips. You're just happy to have a great sister.

It's not until you pull up to the school that you realize you weren't even close to late. There are only a handful of cars parked out front and most of them are staff.
"Hey, Megan?"
"Yeah?"
"Why did you say we were late? Because, from my perspective, we're really stinking early!"
"I have to meet with the team this morning. We're starting a new training regiment to get us ready for our game against the Boars in a few weeks. We can handle everyone else, but they're the champions."
"Interesting story. So, why did you drag me along?! My friends won't be here for another half hour!"
"Tina, your sister needed to come early and I wasn't going to make two trips. Look, it's only for today, so don't worry about it too much. Alright?"
"But mom!"
"Tell you what. Let this go and I'll buy you that RC car you've been wanting." You've been asking about that for months! Obviously you can't drive a real car, but a friend said she could install controls into an RC car. Then you could get around without someone carrying you!
"Plus, I'll owe you one" Megan whispered. That also had some potential.
"*Sigh* Fine" you relent.

The inside is just as dead as the outside. A few students are here, rapidly trying to finish homework or assignments due in a few hours. Teachers glare daggers at everyone in their path as they chug not enough coffee. You and your sister are enrolled at Eagerton Academy, a private school. Despite being a private school, the rules here are much more lax than other academies. You don't need a uniform, you choose your classes, and most of the day is spent at homeroom. You enrolled here because your mom thought public schools might be too cruel to someone like you. Over the years you've gotten to know almost everyone since it's basically been the same people from elementary school until now. One thing you liked was that the school made you your own locker. It sits just at the end of the line of steel doors, perfectly scaled down to your size. You never really have much to put in it, but its such a kind gesture. It's also where Megan decides to drop you off at. After placing you on the ground, she looked ready to run,
"Alright, I need to get moving. I'll see you later, sis. Love you."

Taking off at a full sprint, the giantess disappears down the hallway leaving you alone in the empty hallway. You hand around your locker for awhile, but quickly get bored. You should probably find something to pass the time. Since you're walking now, instead of being carried, it'll take you awhile to get anywhere. But where could you go at this time of day?

You could start heading for Melissa's locker. Your bestie definitely isn't here this early, but by the time you reach her locker she might be. Most of your school days are spent hanging out with her. It's been like that since you two met in kindergarten. She thought you were so cool for being smaller than her barbie. You just like how quickly she accepted you. In the past you've thought about going so far as to asking her out, but decided against it. You don't really have those kind of feelings for her, and you wouldn't want to ruin your friendship. Not to mention Hitomi would probably be with her. The exchange student quickly joined your group of friends when she came here. She knows all about your favorite anime and recommends different series to you, ones that haven't been translated yet. Plus, she's an absolute beauty by japanese standards.

Or you could just head to homeroom early today. Ms. Hamilton is your favorite teacher of all time. The chubby woman was such am air-headed klutz that even you found her cute. She's usually so nervous and nerdy that you want to hug her. But your grades have taken a turn for the worst in the past month. She seems really concerned about it but fails to realize that it's partly her fault. When the warm weather started moving in, she changed her wardrobe to her summer attire. Which included frilly skirts that you could see up easily, cleavage exposing shirts, and, your personal favorite, flip flops. She gave you a desk right underneath her own so the other students couldn't mess with you. It worked great until you started getting a front row seat to her bare feet. The thick toes hypnotize you to the point you haven't been paying attention to her lessons. Maybe you could study a bit more. Or move your desk even closer to the action.

Come to think of it, why didn't you just ask Megan if you could stick with her? Her meeting will be done before class starts, so you wouldn't be late. It would be a pretty fun distraction. A team of sweaty teenage girls working out doesn't sound bad at all. Even if your sister is the prettiest girl on the team didn't make any of the others less attractive. Then again, she already took off. By the time you get there they would have already started and wouldn't notice you. Although...that could be fun as well. If you hurried you could still make it before they finish, they're likely in the school's weightlifting room.

Your line of thought is broken as a huge sneaker lands a few feet away from you. looking up, you see the exchange student from Brazil, Julia Eduarda. She's wearing athletic shorts that go halfway down her thick thighs, and a white tank top with a black sports bra underneath. You watch her walk down the hall a little farther before stopping at the window. It doesn't open due to the fear of people falling but the pane was made to double as a bench so students could sit with a view. The martial artist tossed her back pack aside, kicked off her shoes and leaned back into the pane. Once she was half laying down, half reclined against the wall she fell asleep. One of her legs hung off the edge, letting her foot touch the floor. You've been wanting to talk with her since she first transferred here, but never got the chance before. Maybe this could be your chance to get to know her.
12.title: Hit the books

choices: "What can I do to keep you quiet?"
"Wait, how'd your desk get there anyway?"
122.content:
The thought of Ms. Hamilton getting worried over your grades makes you sad. She's such a nice teacher, you hate making her feel bad. Although she's the very reason your grades are going down. Watching her toes scrunch in her shoes takes more of your attention than the lessons she teaches.

You walk under the door to find the whole classroom empty. Not even the teacher is in yet. Since it's too late to change your mind you head for your desk. In order to keep you safe, your desk is positioned under Ms. Hamilton's. Its a great way for you to get a voyeuristic view up her skirt or at her feet. Especially with her summer wardrobe. You keep moving your desk closer and closer without her noticing over the past few weeks. In fact...since the class is empty, you might as well move a bit more. You throw your back pack on the ground and push your scaled desk towards the teacher's chair. Once you're a few feet closer, you stop and take a seat. If you move too much, she'll notice. You pull out the notes in your back pack and review everything. You may not pay attention during the explanation, but you always copy the notes off the board.

You read for a minutes, absorbing everything easily. Not many people realize it, but you're quite intelligent. Then the sound of the door slamming shut and the slapping of sandals against feet draws your attention. Ms. Hamilton walks to her desk, guzzling coffee out of her mug with a stack of papers in hand. It was a good decision to move your desk. The older woman is wearing a flowing, yellow summer dress and white flip flops. While she stands over your desk you have a clear view of her white panties. Ms. Hamilton is a plump woman, her legs and stomach have some extra padding to them. But to you, its just more to look at. Unfortunately it seems you moved the desk a bit too close. The dirty sole of her shoe blocks out the light before slamming down onto you, crushing you and your desk onto the floor.

A light pressure weigh down on you from the weight of her leg. It twists about for a few seconds before pulling off of you. You're covered in dirt but otherwise fine. Looking up, you notice your goofy teacher having a much harder time.
"Tina?! I'm so sorry, I swear I didn't see you! Are you alright?!" She looks about ready to cry. You stand up and give her a comforting thumbs up. She reaches down and keeps her palm next to you. You climb on her palm to let her hoist you up to her desk. She can't pick you up in fear it would be interpreted as a teacher grabbing a student. Once you hop off, she pulls off her glasses to rub tears away from her eyes.
"Oh god, I didn't mean it! I'm so sorry!"
"Honestly, it's not that big of a deal..."
"It is! Oh god, I could lose my job!" Fear strikes into her face before looking back to you. "Are you...going to tell?"
"No! Ms. Hamilton, you're my favorite teacher. I would never do anything to get you in trouble!"
"Do...do you mean it?"
"Of course!" You exclaim. She bit her lip and looked at you. Her mouth opened slowly and said...
122.title: Underfoot

1221.content:
"Keep me quiet? I just said I wouldn't-"
"I'm serious. I NEED this job, so I'm not taking any chances." Looking into her brown eyes, she's clearly terrified. Telling her not to worry about it clearly wasn't enough.
"...Alright. If it makes you feel better, I guess there is something you can do for me."
"Tell me! Please, I am your's to command! I can't let this get out." It makes you feel bad to make her feel like this. She's your favorite teacher, practically a friend, and she thinks you're going to blackmail her. On the other hand she's still pretty. Her chubby body has large breasts and an enormous ass. Her hair is starting to get grey streaks, and her face has formed a few wrinkles. But over all, she's still pretty. You never had any intentions to abuse her in any way, but now that you have the opportunity you might as well take it.

"Are you sure? I mean, you know I'm lesbian. Right? Plus, I am going through puberty..."
"Oh god...you don't want to...do stuff with me right? That'll get me fired even more!"
"No, I'm not talking about sex."
"Thank you. Oh thank you. But if that isn't what you want, why did you make it sound like that?"
"You see...I have a fetish. Even if we're seen like this, people would never think of it as directly sexual. But no one would see. So, if you indulge me in this, I'll keep quiet."
"I...suppose I could do that. How are you going to make it so no one sees us?"
"Honestly its a bit self explanatory by the fetish. I want you to..."
1221.title: Blackmailing against your will

choices: Suddenly, someone else comes into the room
12211.content:
Ms. Hamilton was surprised. Of all the things it could be, you had asked her to eat you. Your teacher looked down, unsure of the request.

“Are you sure? What if you get hurt, or digested? Isn’t there anything else you could do?” She asked, worried. Suddenly, her belly started to groan. Though you were small, you could hear it and it made you want to be devoured even more.

“You don’t need to worry about me, I’m immune to digestion. I know this because I have been eaten before, it’s a long story. Besides, I taste good.” You said. Ms. Hamilton still wasn’t sure, but she eventually started to lick you. As she covered you in saliva, you enjoyed the feeling of her tongue against your skin. After licking you a few times, your teacher nodded.

“You were right, you do taste good. Better than anything I have ever had. But, if I eat you, how will you get out?” You simply smiled at her question.

“Simple, when you feel it’s safe for me to come out, pat your belly three times. As long as I’m careful, I can climb out your throat. When I do, you need to stay still. It won’t hurt, but it makes it easier if you’re not moving, and it will feel a little weird.” You explained, making her smile.

“Well, since you have this planned out, I guess I have no choice but to eat you.” She said.

“Just one thing, if you decide to chew me, try to be careful. I’m durable, but I’m not invulnerable.” You said. Ms. Hamilton gave you another lick.”

“If it’s alright with you, I would like to…
12211.title: Requested meal for the teacher

choices: I have a confession to make."
your dad made me an offer."
125.content:
Before you can move an inch, the familiar sound of flip flops sounds down the hallway. The only one with footwear that loud could only be your bully, Kayla. You open your locker and pretend to be sorting through it, acting like you don't know she's coming. Normally someone would run away when their bully comes around. But not you. Kayla Lindt has been beating on you for the past ten years. An entire decade of her trying to stomp you out of existence. She treats you like a bug...and you love it. Your hidden fetishes come to life as she physically and verbally degrades you. It's a bit unhealthy, but you have a major crush on her.

It's not that hard to fall for her. Kayla is tall, blonde, and sexy as hell. Her body is tight and trim thanks to her exercise as the volleyball captain. Everyday she wears the same outfit. A white tank top that hugs her breasts, black yoga pants, and flip flops. She gets manicures and pedicures once a week, always with black nail polish. A long blonde ponytail reaches her butt. Her personality can be hard to deal with at times though. A total alpha, she needs to be in charge of others and can be incredibly bossy. That's why she only has two friends around her at all times.

Krissy and Shelli, two empty headed goons that can't do anything but follow instructions. They once tried to bully you in order to impress Kayla. The next day they came to school with black eyes. Kayla had put them in their place, saying she was the one that got to torment you and they were overstepping their bounds. Krissy is a chubby blonde and Shelli is is a skinny punk with pink, under cut hair. They act as her yes-men, basically following her and agreeing with whatever she says.

A loud crash rings out behind you. You fake surprise as you turn around to look at the flip flop clad foot. Her foot looks perfect as usual, the black polish glinting in the overhead light. You look up to see the blonde athlete smiling wickedly down at you. Time for some acting.
"K-kayla?! What are you doing here?!"
"Well, bug, I'm always here early. This is the only time of day I can get some peace in the weight room, but your shit sister kicked me out. I've been hoping to find a way to relieve some stress. You'll be perfect." Her foot slips out of her shoe and swings over to you. Before you know what hits you, she grabs you between her toes. The familiar smell of coconut lotion fills your nose, mixed slightly with sweat. You could recognize the scent of her feet anywhere. She slips her foot back into the shoe, pinning you between her foot and the toe divider.
"Let's go somewhere a bit more private."

Her weight presses into you hard. Hundreds of tons of weight press into you every step she takes, and you love every second of it. The warmth of her flesh, the smell of sweat and coconut, the smooth feeling of her soft skin. But something doesn't seem quite right. Her two goons aren't with her. Plus, she's just transporting you. Normally she'd be happy to stomp you into the ground there in the hallway. Why was she taking you somewhere else.

A few minutes later her foot pulls out, leaving you alone on the surface of her empty footwear. Her fingers snatch you up and hold you tightly in a fist. The pressure feels pretty nice, and it only gets better by Kayla holding you in front of her pretty face. You try to hide your blush by flailing around. Getting held by your crush like this is pretty nice...
"Tina, we need to talk." That, however, made you terrified. Firstly, Kayla has never called you Tina since you first met her. Then there's the tone of her voice. She's not calm like usual, she's worried about something. Lastly, she pulled you into this place, likely the janitor's closet, to talk to you instead of torture you. You stop struggling and look her in her beautiful blue eye.
"Alright, I'm listening." She seems shocked by your calm attitude but quickly recovers.
"Look, I'm going to be perfectly honest. The reason I pulled you in here like this is..."
125.title: Crushed

1251.content:
"You want to confess something to me? What, feeling guilty about something?" Your heart is beating like crazy. An overactive imagination is forcing the thought of her confessing her love of you into your head. But that could never happen in a million years.
"Guilty? Maybe. I don't really know how to describe how I feel. I just thought today would be a good day to talk to you since no one else is around." Oh god, she looks so embarrassed. She's biting her lower lip, making your heart do somersaults. Someone so sexy and powerful shouldn't get to look so cute!
"So, what exactly did you want to confess?"
"...I'm sorry. For everything that I've done to you over the years. It's inexcusable, but I hope you could forgive me. It's just...ugh, I don't know how to say this. When I first met you, I didn't know what to say. One thing led to another and...sorry. I know you must hate me..."
"I DON'T!" you yell out. Shit. That looked so desperate. Now she's looking at you again! Of course she'd be confused by that kind of declaration.
"You don't? But...I've been so horrible to you!"
"Still, I honestly don't hate you."
"...Tina?"
"Yeah?"
"What I want to say is...I love you."
"..."
"...Tina?"

"My stomach really hurts."

Tina was taken slightly aback, perplexed by Jo's plight; why would her boss ask her about being eaten in private when she had something of an aching stomach? Tina had a stomachache once when she was younger, but that was because she was subjected to a bug that went around. Needless to say, her throw-up was so tiny, it was like only a noticeable drop to every normal-sized being around her.

"Okay," Tina said. "So you have a stomachache you can't get rid of? Don't you have some medicine back home you can take?"

"No, you don't understand, girl, it's not a normal stomachache... although you can call that less than normal," Jo said, flinching as a sharp pain poked her inside of her abdomen, followed by a deep growl from her stomach. "I started feeling like this ever since I got up this morning, right before I had my breakfast. I hadn't felt this kind of pain when I was sleeping, so I assumed that it had something to do with what I ate last night for dinner. I thought maybe some over easy eggs and some coffee, and even a seltzer tablet might alleviate the pain, but it didn't help me squat."

"So, in short, you want me to go down into your stomach and find what's causing your stomach to get all upset?" Tina astutely asked.

Jo regretfully shook her head no. "Sorry, kid, but I can't take that chance again. The last time I took a laxative was for my colonoscopy exam and things just went south for me when I had my bowels cleaned out. My ass was so burning hot from all that crappin' that I had to sleep with it exposed to the open air."

Tina grimaced. The talk about Jo's sexy thick ass made your heart beat faster and your temperature rise, but by the time she heard about her boss's bowels being cleansed out, it put her off.

Once in her office she shuts the door behind her and places you on her desk.

It isn't much of an office, more like a backroom with a desk and a few motivational posters. Only a single bulb hangs from the ceiling to add more light than the dirty window. She uses this place for interviews and paperwork. Why she brought you back here though...
"What's up, Jo?"

"Jo...are...are you firing me?!"
"Bingo." Tears begin forming in your eyes. You fight them back, but some still run down your cheek.
"But...but...I thought we were friends!"
"Kiddo, you know I love ya to death. But I need to cut payroll or I could lose the store." She reaches out and ruffles your hair. Normally you love receiving affection like this, but it doesn't stop your sadness.
"But...I could come up with ideas! I can help!"

You actually liked working here. Besides Rahale everyone treated you nicely, and they were pretty. The work was simple but it made you feel...useful. Everyone around you is kind and loves you dearly. Your mom picked you up while you were still sobbing. She talked with Jo for awhile, but understood why she needed to let you go. "Oh honey..."
"What am I supposed to do now?"
"Well...I could pull a few strings and...I could get you another job."
"Really?!"
"Yeah, it won't be like the coffeshop though."
"I get it. There won't be a boss like Jo anymore."

"So, what would I be doing?"
"Well, that depends. I can think of two people with openings and one that I could ask to give you an internship."
"An internship? But...I'm a student. Plus I need money to go out with friends."
"I think it's a paid internship. Plus it's fine for students to apply."
"Alright, does the other jobs pay good?"
"Better than the Black Kettle ever did."

During the drive, mom explained the different positions. One job was at her friend, Han Soo-Jin's, daycare center. She needed someone to help entertain the children so she can pull away. Apparently she's exhausted being the only one there to cook, clean, play, and handle the paperwork. She can handle most things, but she wants to use the time for playing to do paperwork so she can go home earlier. The job pays fairly well, but it involves dealing with children. Her daycare manages kids from 5-10 years old. It could be fun, although the less well-behaved kids might use you like a toy.

The second job is a laundry mat owned by her friend Sofia Vallone. It's a family business, so most of the employees are already close. In her defense, english isn't her first language. The job pays an amazingly high amount and involves a lot of paperwork, but also helping out her family when they ask. Lastly is the internship with Alexis Wells. Apparently she works for a prestigious medical research company. She's the head security officer and is offering an internship to students to act as her assistant. If you finish the internship, you'll be offered a college scholarship towards a medical degree and a high ranking position in the company.
